Return Hospital Field

return_hospital_field.Rd

To accommodate differences in column names between databases, find the name of the column corresponding to the hospital for downstream queries.

Usage

return_hospital_field(db)

Arguments

db

(DBIConnection)
RPostgres DB connection.

Value

(character)
hospital_id or hospital_num, with preference given to hospital_id if it exists.

On this page

Developed by GEMINI.
